title: Custom Explosher
paragraphs: The Custom Explosher is a main weapon in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3. It is a Custom-branded variant of the Explosher.

In Splatoon 2, the Custom Explosher is nearly identical in appearance to the Explosher. The only difference between the two is that the Custom Explosher has a sticker bearing the Custom logo on its side.
In Splatoon 3, the Custom sticker is still present, but the color of the weapon is beige instead of olive green.
The Custom Explosher was announced on 24 November 2018. It was added to the game on 5 December 2018 as part of the version 4.3.0 release.[1]
- An Inkling holding the Custom Explosher during the Family vs. Friends Splatfest.
The Custom Explosher returns in Splatoon 3 with a new design and beige color. The weapon was added in the Fresh Season 2024 update. Its kit comes with Splash Walls and the Triple Splashdown.
- The Octoling in the center is sitting on the Custom Explosher.
